user.title: Open Rail Data (Network Rail)
user.description: Connect to Network Rail's public STOMP feed (OpenRailData).

add_station.title: Add Station
add_station.description: Search for a station to add. Station names are often abbreviated (e.g., 'MANC' for Manchester, 'PADD' for Paddington, 'EUSTON' for London Euston).

remove_station.title: Remove Station
remove_station.description: Select a station to remove from tracking.

configure_filters.title: Configure Filters
configure_filters.description: These filters apply to all tracked stations.

data.event_types: Filter by event types (e.g. ARRIVAL, DEPARTURE)

configure_train_describer.title: Configure Train Describer
configure_train_describer.description:
Enable Train Describer feed to track train positions through signalling berths. This is useful for creating network diagrams.

Leave TD areas empty to receive all messages, or specify specific area IDs (e.g., 'SK', 'G1', 'RW') to filter.

Event history size controls how many recent TD events are kept for each area (default: 10, range: 1-50).

data.td_areas: TD Area IDs (comma-separated, e.g., 'SK, G1, RW')

configure_network_diagrams.title: Configure Network Diagrams
configure_network_diagrams.description: Manage Network Diagram sensors. Each diagram shows train positions on a map of berth connections.

add_diagram.title: Add Network Diagram
add_diagram.description: Search for a station to use as the center of the diagram. The range controls how many stations in each direction to include (1-5).

edit_diagram.title: Edit Network Diagram
edit_diagram.description: Edit an existing network diagram configuration.

delete_diagram.title: Delete Network Diagram
delete_diagram.description: ⚠️ Warning: This action cannot be undone. Select a diagram to delete.

search_station.title: Search for Station
search_station.description: Enter a station name to search for its STANOX code. Station names are often abbreviated (e.g., 'MANC' for Manchester, 'PADD' for Paddington, 'EUSTON' for London Euston).

error.no_results: No stations found matching your search. Try a different search term.
error.station_already_exists: This station is already being tracked.
error.no_diagrams_configured: No diagrams are configured yet. Please add a diagram first.
error.diagram_already_exists: A diagram for this station is already configured.
